entry.title: Toto demo
entry.content: I’ve just posted a demo site for Toto at http://jeremyot.com/Toto. It’s a simple relay-chat application with no backing store, so anything you post will be broadcast to anyone else viewing the page and then lost. I built Toto to simplify web service development for a few projects that I’ve been working on and it’s proving to be quite useful. Check out the full source on github for more information.
